positive.review:
A simple yet addictive free to play game! I love that you have quest with this cute idle fishing game.
Yes it is a cash grab game. I heard the market crashed for this game in another review. I just idle it for fun
and achievements. I am not in a rush and do not mind if it takes me time without feeding into the cash grab.
Pretty good self-contained game, especially for the price
Game of the year (A game where you catch fish) When is the next update defeated the hardest fish and unlocked the secret mine only took me 233 hours

A perfectly reel idle game! The core loop is simple but addictive. Upgrade your boat, automate your fleet, and watch the money swim in. It's a great game to have on the line in the background. I'm thoroughly hooked!
I enjoyed this fun almost idle game
good game.
no caras 2/10
GG!

this game is nice and fun to play when bored with anything else. this looks very good with this coming from mobile port, although progression is very slow and i feel like gems are almost useless as you cant play ADs.

A simple yet addictive free to play game! I love that you have quest with this cute idle fishing game.
Yes it is a cash grab game. I heard the market crashed for this game in another review. I just idle it for fun
and achievements. I am not in a rush and do not mind if it takes me time without feeding into the cash grab.
Pretty good self-contained game, especially for the price

Relaxing and surprisingly engaging! Watching your underwater empire grow is genuinely satisfying. The art style is charming, and I appreciate the thoughtful progression system. A perfect game for a chill evening.
casual fish collecting game. starts off at a slow pace, does not take long before the money starts rolling in and your upgrading the boat and hiring other fishermen for you
Game of the year (A game where you catch fish) When is the next update defeated the hardest fish and unlocked the secret mine only took me 233 hours

A perfectly reel idle game! The core loop is simple but addictive. Upgrade your boat, automate your fleet, and watch the money swim in. It's a great game to have on the line in the background. I'm thoroughly hooked!
Great little mindless game to pass the hours
it is great but gets boring
A game for relaxation
I enjoyed this fun almost idle game
good game.
no caras 2/10
good
boring as fuck
noice
nice
ok
GG!

My gambling addict friend said if I post a review and it gets 150 likes and 50 Awards that he will buy me a case of beer, some vodka and 1 kg of lemon So im just gonna leave this here.

negative.review:
over-priced predatory shop, over-grind game design, items to trade on steam market massively over-priced so the dev can take a big slice, the little here to like is massively overshadowed by the total tripe.
some devs bring cancer to the industry, this one brings plague
game devs are like politicians. they start out with good intentions but quickly become as corrupt by their peers.
other more palatable poisons are available

After you reach level 5, progress in the game becomes very, very slow, in other words, impossible.
And the only way to continue the game is with boxes that can be purchased with real money
Don't waste your time on them. Many games are free, but then they make you pay money
Note: The items that drop are really worthless, and the most they cost is three cents.
3 updates in 2025 ! bad news for future player. Add new content! you can end game in ~15h
Game just crashes after you get so far. No support to fix. Unplayable

Its a shame games like this don't play out as good as they could be. Cash grab and possibly a scam. Don't bother it gets stale and repetitive very fast. Not a true idle game either. Oh and the market crashed nothing worth selling now.

Extreme grind !
300 houres, game left running when i have slept and such, and im still not lvl 10. I did not prioritice exp gain so its possible to lvl faster, but to a cost of weaker fishing.
Can be fun and relaxing but progress is extreme slow.
complete garbage underdeveloped port of a mobile cashgrab
I mean, obviously predatory IAPs aside, going through the faff of building the submarine only to be told "Coming Soon"? Yeah, instantly uninstalled.
dumb cash grab, no gameplay at all, just grind
It's broke and they can't be arsed to fix it
P2W nothing idle about this.
actually shish
pay2win grind
üê†
p2w bs

Progression is very fun for the first 20 hours. Until you unlock level 7 and realize you have now hit the paywall. If you free to play it will take you years to grind to get past the level so might as well quit now. Give it a try until level 6 and you can stop playing.

over-priced predatory shop, over-grind game design, items to trade on steam market massively over-priced so the dev can take a big slice, the little here to like is massively overshadowed by the total tripe.
some devs bring cancer to the industry, this one brings plague
game devs are like politicians. they start out with good intentions but quickly become as corrupt by their peers.
other more palatable poisons are available

The game looks and runs ok, it's just that after a few hours in, even playing actively doesn't get you anywhere.
the systems are built to be dependent on either:
-getting a free couple of loot boxes everyday which has an abysmally low chance of rewarding anything that would help you equip to progress further (abysmally low is less than .0)
-pay.

give it a try, worst case it'll give you something to check out for a couple of days while you keep it open in the background.

After you reach level 5, progress in the game becomes very, very slow, in other words, impossible.
And the only way to continue the game is with boxes that can be purchased with real money
Don't waste your time on them. Many games are free, but then they make you pay money
Note: The items that drop are really worthless, and the most they cost is three cents.
3 updates in 2025 ! bad news for future player. Add new content! you can end game in ~15h
Game just crashes after you get so far. No support to fix. Unplayable

Its a shame games like this don't play out as good as they could be. Cash grab and possibly a scam. Don't bother it gets stale and repetitive very fast. Not a true idle game either. Oh and the market crashed nothing worth selling now.

Extreme grind !
300 houres, game left running when i have slept and such, and im still not lvl 10. I did not prioritice exp gain so its possible to lvl faster, but to a cost of weaker fishing.
Can be fun and relaxing but progress is extreme slow.
Incomplete game, a dissapointment. Very buggy and full of text strings from programming code.
i like idle games but this one is not finished. sub is locked till next update and last update was a year ago

Wasn't a big fan of the 1st one, or the demo of this one, but when I saw it was free I thought it wouldn't hurt to give it another go. Progress is slow, fish have a habit of swimming through areas making catching special ones really annoying. It could be a good game but this is just a re skinned clone of Alien Invasion which also kinda sucked. Anyway, I carried on and got quite far then I read some reviews and noticed many said it isn't even finished. So there's no point carrying on.Might come back in the future to see if it's been finished.
This game terrible. I think it only exists to launder money through Steam Market place.
complete garbage underdeveloped port of a mobile cashgrab
I mean, obviously predatory IAPs aside, going through the faff of building the submarine only to be told "Coming Soon"? Yeah, instantly uninstalled.
dumb cash grab, no gameplay at all, just grind
I think I broke the game. Fish are not respawning.
It's broke and they can't be arsed to fix it
Literally got bored of this after one minute of play.
Not actually an idle game.
its time consuming
I hate this game
P2W nothing idle about this.
actually shish
pay2win grind
üê†
p2w bs
